title: Baked Trout Saratoga
ingredients: ['1 (2kg) whole trout, cleaned', 'Maldon Sea Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 clove garlic, minced', '110ml (4 fl oz) white wine', '1 lemon, cut into wedges', '4 sprigs fresh parsley']
